name: shapefile
description: An implementation of the shapefile (.shp) spatial data format.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.node.js dist/shapefile.node.js && rollup -g path-source,array-source,stream-source,slice-source -f cjs -- index.js | tail -n +2 >> dist/shapefile.node.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" -o dist/shapefile.min.js -cm -- dist/shapefile.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j dist/shapefile.zip -- LICENSE.txt README.md dist/shapefile.js dist/shapefile.min.js
